query: What was Joe Rivera's position at Gulfstream?

[Craig Klebe Outline #1.docx, p.1]

[CITIOM Amended Statement of Claim.pdf, p.6]
29. It is CITIOM’s position that such corrosion should not have occurred, or

[CITIOM v. Gulfstream - LB Expert Rebuttal Report (4-21-25).pdf, p.2]
including holding positions of technician, crew chief, foreman, supervisor, manager, director and

[CITIOM v. Gulfstream - LB Expert Rebuttal Report (4-21-25).pdf, p.3]

[CITIOM v. Gulfstream - LB Expert Rebuttal Report (4-21-25).pdf, p.3]
In 1991, I accepted the position of Director of Maintenance for the Eastman Kodak
